document.text:
From: 
To: 
Subject: FW: 
Follow-up 
Date: Wed, 15 Apr 2020 
21:48:25 +0000 
Forwarded without comment. 
From: William Callahan 
Sent: Wednesday, April 15, 2020 14:18 
To: 
Subject: Re: 
Follow-up 
Attn: 
Around last Dec 19, 2019, we corresponded re HRH Andrew -- and a potential role I could play having been 
asked by my Investigative colleagues in London to try and act as his NY counsel. At the time I could not find 
out what solicitors were representing him -- Around mid-March 2020, I learned that two British lawyers were 
representing him: Gary Bloxsome, a London Solicitor who specialized in Extradition matters, and Clare 
Montgomery, QC, a Barrister, also sp • •   • • tradition matters. I emailed both to see if I could get an 
interest. Bloxsome never replied and Paralegsal Clerk to Montgomery, emailed me back to 
indicate she had read and acknowledged my email. No further responses since that time. 
I am assuming that it is their intention to do nothing -- expecting that your investigation will not proceed. There 
is no question in my mind that Andrew was deeply involved with Epstein and was very friendly with Ghislaine 
Maxwell and likely is in touch with her now believed to be in Israel. 
So, I wish you good luck and perhaps his counsel will reach back to me. 
Bill Callahan 
William P. Callahan 
Attorney At Law 
New York, NY 10016 (now working at home) 
On Thu, Dec 19, 2019 at 12:16 PM William Callahan wrote: 
Will do 
Thanks, 
On 
Thu, Dec 19, 2019 at 12:14 PM 
wrote: 
Mr. Callahan, 
Thank you for your email, and for speaking with me yesterday. As we discussed, we're not able to talk about 
hypothetical representations, but to the extent you ultimately represent anyone who may have information in 
connection with our ongoing investigation, please feel free to give us a call if/when that happens. 
EFTA00026609

Best regards, 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
From: William 
Callahan 
Sent: Thursday, December 19, 2019 11:10 
To: 
Subject: Follow-up 
Attn: 
AUSA 
Re: Epstein Matter 
Confirming our tel-conference of yesterday and the Subject discussed, I expect it will take 3-4 weeks for me 
to engage in discussions with Subject or his representative. 
Thank you, 
William P. Callahan 
Attorney At Law 
President, Unitel 
New York, NY 10016 
https://callahanandrobinson.corn/lawyers/ 
www.unitel.com  (click on British Flag) 
Formerly U.S. Department of Justice 
Member Association of Former Intelligence officers (AFIO) 
Member, International Bar Association, London 
EFTA00026610
